answers.answer: HiPain in the feet can be due to a lot of causes such as excessive walking, problems with gait, being overweight, nerve problems, or other diseases such as diabetes, gout etc.Does your friend have any other medical conditions? other symptoms?What is her age and physical condition? What is the duration of her symptoms?It would be helpful if you write in with more information.Regards

question: My friend has pain in her feet when she walks too much, She doesn't know what cause it. Could you email me  then I will call her to let her know she does not have a computer. TY
title: Burning pain in feet
